name: @get-set-fetch/test-utils
description: scraping test definitions, launches resources to be scraped under a configurable web server

scripts.prebuild: mkdir dist && npm run prebuild:cjs && npm run prebuild:esm
scripts.prebuild:cjs: mkdir dist/cjs && cp -R lib/scraping-suite dist/cjs/scraping-suite && rm dist/cjs/scraping-suite/ScrapingSuite.ts
scripts.prebuild:esm: mkdir dist/esm && cp -R lib/scraping-suite dist/esm/scraping-suite && rm dist/esm/scraping-suite/ScrapingSuite.ts
